Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods

Class Hera

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Hera
public class Hera
extends GodStrategy
This class implements the Hera strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God. Specifically, Hera imposes Win constraints to other players: an opponent cannot win by moving into a perimeter space.

  • Method Details

    • checkWinConstraints

      public boolean checkWinConstraints​(Worker opponentWorker, Cell moveCell)
      Implements Hera Win Constraints to other players.
      Overrides:
      checkWinConstraints in class GodStrategy
      Parameters:
      opponentWorker - the opponent selected worker for the current turn.
      moveCell - the cell in which the opponent Player moved the selected worker.
      Returns:
      true if the Cell where the opposite Worker moved is not a perimeter Cell, false otherwise
      See Also:
      isPerimeterCell(Cell)

    • isPerimeterCell

      private boolean isPerimeterCell​(Cell cell)
      Checks if the Cell passed is on the perimeter of the game Board.
      Parameters:
      cell - the Cell in which the Opponent Worker was moved
      Returns:
      true if the Cell is in the perimeter of the game Board, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      Board.WIDTH_SIZE, Board.HEIGHT_SIZE
